text.author: Simon Peter Hughes, Elgaard, Mx. Granger and others (see URL)
text.title: Cuba
text.summary: This guide to visas and legal issues for foreigners entering Cuba explains how to obtain a required tourist visa card and what it costs in different locations, how long tourists from various countries may remain in Cuba, and about the cash departure tax of CUC 25 when departing Cuba by airplane.
